document.full_text: the nasdaq omx group is seeking financing for a potential rival bid for nyse euronext, but the exchange operator still faces big obstacles as it seeks a merger partner.
document.title: as nasdaq weighs nyse bid, big hurdles remain
lines_and_colors: the nasdaq omx group is seeking financing for a potential rival bid for nyse euronext, but the exchange operator still faces big obstacles as it seeks a merger partner.
